ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Zone size on the Moon? RoK big or SoL size?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard that the zones are going to be huge like Western Karana, after all why else would they introduce horses? ... smaller ... the
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard that the zones are going to be huge like Western Karana, after
all why else would they introduce horses?

You wrote:
> Your note gets me wondering something, has anyone seen or heard what the
> zone sizes will be for SoL? I remember how bad I hated the new zones when
> RoK came out. Oh so big, but then with SoV they seemed to scale them
smaller
> than RoK, but larger than the first ever zones in Everquest. I sure hope
the
> Moon has about the same size zones as Great Divide, I think that is about
> the perfect size zone. So has anyone heard?
>
